original_text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death: but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep.
korean_text: 예수는 그의 죽음을 가리켜 말씀하신 것이나 그들은 잠들어 쉬는 것을 가리켜 말씀하심인 줄 생각하는지라

sentences.original_text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death:
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 예수님은 자신의 죽음에 대해 말씀하셨다:

sentences.original_text: that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 잠자면서 쉬는 것에 대해 말했다고
